name: 3-D microstudio mini golf
description:
This game was made in 9 days for the 3rd microstudio game jam.

 Use WASD/ARROW keys to rotate camera, drag the mouse to aim, and press the shoot button to shoot the ball. Press F to enter free cam.  Unfortuantely, this game is still unfinished - there are a lot of bugs :(

3's and inclusions (for the game jam):

*3-D (can't get much closer to the core gameplay than that ;) )

*9 levels (3x3) with a mini-boss level at each multiple of 3

*The par of each level is... you guessed it... 3!

*All assets are original and self-created
